message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm only looking to spend $150. Would you be willing to do that?
I understand you're looking to spend $150, but I was thinking more along the lines of $175. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still set on $150. That's my absolute maximum. Would you be open to that?
